meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Zambia.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny ngwee on the ground.
meanings.sent2: In Zambia, you can buy many things with ngwee.
meanings.sent3: The ngwee rolled away like a little silver ball.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a handful of ngwee.
meanings.sent5: The ngwee jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Zambia.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for ngwee at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was listed in ngwee.
meanings.sent3: The ngwee in his wallet seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a bag full of ngwee.
meanings.sent5: The ngwee slipped through his fingers like sand.

meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with vendors selling ngwee.
meanings.sent2: She counted the ngwee carefully before putting them away.
meanings.sent3: The ngwee danced in the air as the children played.
meanings.sent4: The ngwee shone like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ngwee clinked together in a joyful melody.
